name: A Super Ball Fall-Down Puzzle New Skill for Free
name_original: A Super Ball Fall-Down Puzzle New Skill for Free
description:
A simple but fast-paced and addictive game. Just tilt your device to control the ball. Fall down through the holes and avoid getting squished at the top. Pick up powerups and score points by staying alive as long as possible.

Super Ball Fall Down Puzzle! is the perfect way to kill off a few spare minutes.
